SCRUM team to build a granular computer model of business products processes resources and dependencies in a DevTestStageProduction environment with iteration control in GitHub and puppet This iOS and Response to Restoration and Recovery of the business by establishing Restoration Priorities of each unit ahead of a disaster This flexible framework meets the stringent requirements of the Federal
